#summary Implementations of the URI Template specification

= RFC6570 Implementations =

Implementations of the URI Template specification, [http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6570 RFC6570], along with the level of the spec they claim. 

*Implementers note*: a [https://github.com/uri-templates/uritemplate-test common test suite] is being collected.

  * [https://github.com/tavis-software/UriTemplates C#] (level 4)
  * [https://github.com/damnhandy/Handy-URI-Templates Java] (level 4)
  * [https://github.com/fxa/uritemplate-js JavaScript] (level 4)
  * [http://search.cpan.org/dist/URI-Template/ Perl] (level 4)
  * [https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle PHP] (level 4)
  * [https://github.com/uri-templates/uritemplate-py Python] (level 4)
  * [http://addressable.rubyforge.org/ Ruby] (level 4)
  * [https://github.com/arktekk/uri-template Scala] (level 4)
